You can use it with

This is huge for those that never wanted to update past 3.41. I cant wait till people start making the eboots.

Another method:


download scetool.exe from psdevwiki

google zlib1.dll, and your 3.60 eboot put them in the main ps3tools 3.2 folder 
run the gui, 
click sce tool, 
click resign for +
